---
desc: Converts govspeak example callout ($E text $E syntax) into GOV.UK Frontend-compliant HTML
---

.
$E This is an inset text line $E
.
<div data-govspeak="example-callout">
<p class="govuk-body">This is an inset text line</p>
</div>
.

.
$E This is an inset text line
$E
.
<div data-govspeak="example-callout">
<p class="govuk-body">This is an inset text line</p>
</div>
.

.
$E
This is an inset text line
$E
.
<div data-govspeak="example-callout">
<p class="govuk-body">This is an inset text line</p>
</div>
.

.
$E

This is an inset text line $E
.
<div data-govspeak="example-callout">
<p class="govuk-body">This is an inset text line</p>
</div>
.

.
$E **Example**
This is an inset text line
$E
.
<div data-govspeak="example-callout">
<p class="govuk-body"><strong>Example</strong>
This is an inset text line</p>
</div>
.

.
$E This is an inset text line $E
$E with a second line $E
.
<div data-govspeak="example-callout">
<p class="govuk-body">This is an inset text line</p>
</div>
<div data-govspeak="example-callout">
<p class="govuk-body">with a second line</p>
</div>
.

.
Normal paragraph.

$E Inset after paragraph $E
.
<p class="govuk-body">Normal paragraph.</p>
<div data-govspeak="example-callout">
<p class="govuk-body">Inset after paragraph</p>
</div>
.

.
> Blockquote
$E Inset after blockquote $E
.
<blockquote class="govuk-inset-text govuk-!-margin-left-0">
<p class="govuk-body">Blockquote</p>
</blockquote>
<div data-govspeak="example-callout">
<p class="govuk-body">Inset after blockquote</p>
</div>
.

.
$E
This is an inset text line
^ nested information callout
$E
.
<div data-govspeak="example-callout">
<p class="govuk-body">This is an inset text line</p>
<div data-govspeak="information-callout" aria-label="Information" role="note">
<p class="govuk-body">nested information callout</p>
</div>
</div>
.

.
$E
oh my
% this is a warning callout %
$E
.
<div data-govspeak="example-callout">
<p class="govuk-body">oh my</p>
<div data-govspeak="warning-callout" aria-label="Warning" role="note">
<p class="govuk-body">this is a warning callout</p>
</div>
</div>
.
